comments.comment:
Gon Buruwa. Issellama buduhamuduruwange pilimaya ayi karapan. Ubala karagatta dewal walata budu Hamuduruvo Pali neha harako. 

Gon Wasse. Ehema ledak hadanne a wage Leda tiyena ekek ekka hitiyothne. Itin ehema novi hitiyama leda hadenne naane. Anika uba hari baba. Uba gaanu ekka idalama nedda thaama me wenakal. Ane gobbayo. Katha karanna kalin mole pawichchi karapan. Danne nethnam Oya issaraha inna ube salli walata kahina gothayagenwath ahaganin modaya. 

Den yako apida Piyumi hansamalita laksha 06 k dunne. Thomane deela tiyenne. Apen ahala apita kiyalada dunne. A deddith uba denagena hitiye nedda piyumi ganikawak kiyala. Leda hadei kiyala. Uba piyumiwa denagatteth a salli dena dawasemada. Ane pako. Denawatg Oya boruwa nawathwala atta katha karapan. Mokada weraddak unath atta piliganna manussayek weyan. Ginnak nethiwa dumak naginne neha kiyala kathawak ahalama nedda. Eka ubata bara wedinama eka athakin athpudi gahanna beha kiyala ahala tiyenawada. 

Bola harako. Ganikawak kiyala kiyanawanam uba Piyumi hansamalita itin uba salli deela tiyenne ganikawakatane. Yako ganikawakata udawwak karanne mokata kiyala thota therenne nethi unata danna un dannawa. Danne nethnam Oya issaraha inna gon wassagen ahaganin. 

Priyan kiyana keppa wasso. Ponnayek wage hesirenne nethiwa baduwaj gehuwwanam gehuwwa kiyala puliganin. Eka berinam uba Bada uda negapu gaanunta witharak apahasa nokara. Ekath berinam katai pukai wahagena idapan. Tho hithanna tho mahaloku salli karayek kiyalada. Uba oyatharam salli karayeknam ubata chodanawak awa gaman uba budu Hamuduruwange pilimeta atha tiyala diwuranawane. A dewal epa ube incomparable tax details pennapan. Ita passe api therum gannam. Oyatharamata dagalanna epa gono.
